Interview

the website of Interview with VitePress

Get Started

Easy Setup

Minimal setup with markdown-centered project structure helps you focus on writing.

Vue-Powered

Enjoy the dev experience of Vue + webpack, use Vue components in markdown, and develop custom themes with Vue.

Performant

VitePress generates pre-rendered static HTML for each page, and runs as an SPA once a page is loaded.
